name: European Utilities Telecom Council
legal: Operation Centre of a foreign not-for-profit organisation
goal:
EUTC is the largest professional association for telecommunications specialists working
within utility and energy companies. It brings industry experts together from across Europe,
enabling them to share knowledge and stay up-to-date in this rapidly changing field. EUTC also works in partnership with EU institutions, which seek its opinions on important issues such as spectrum allocation and development of the future energy grid. Members of the
EUTC have access to the latest information on key telecoms issues affecting the utilities sector.
interests: Communication, Digital economy and society, Energy, Research and innovation
euInitiatives:
Telecommunications
Energy
Energy Union
Spectrum Allocation
Digital Economy
New Electricity Market Design
5G Network Technology
